avatar.refresh.title: Update avatar
create.room.page.title: Create a new room
room.playing.title: And now the game begins!
home.title: The right way to kill your friends..
home.subtitle: Kill or be killed, make your choice.
home.description:
An evening with friends... How about adding a little atmosphere by making all these nice people kill each other?
 Killer Party is a simple party game that can be played throughout an evening or a meal.
home.create.room.error: An error has occured while creating a new room. Please retry later.
home.join.room.code.label: Type the code of the room to join
home.create.pseudo.label: Before starting, create your pseudo
home.first.rule.title: Create your assassination contracts
home.first.rule.text:
Assassination contracts are distributed randomly among players.
In the waiting room, you can add your own contracts that will be distributed to other players!
home.second.rule.title: Get an assassination contract and eliminate your targets to progress.
home.second.rule.text:
When you start a game, you will receive a contract with a mission and a target to kill.
You have to succeed in making your target doing the mission you received.
home.third.rule.title: Get the contracts of your targets after having knocked them out
home.third.rule.text:
When you assassinate your target, you get back his contract as well as the target of this contract.
To win the game, you must succeed in eliminating all your targets with their respective contracts.
But.. don't forget that you are also the target of other assassin !

room.target.title: Try to kill your target and survive!
room.target.mission: In order to kill your target, it must do:
room.killed.notify: Click on the button above to notify other players that you have been killed.
room.player.killed.title: Too bad! You are dead.
room.player.killed.resume: Dead men tell no tales.. You just have to wait for the end of the game.
room.player.killed.modal.title: Killed by my target
room.player.killed.modal.warning: You will not be able to play this party anymore and be considered as dead!
room.winner.name: And the winner is.. {{playerName}}!
